name: 100 (itch) (Basiccomputer)
description:
100 is a challenging game where you are against the computer you
must select cards to score points. The Computer is dealt with 1
card and you are dealt 3 cards. Choose 1 of them to score points.
You must keep drawing and picking cards until either you or the
Computer scores 100 points or over. Whoever scores 100 or over
points wins the game. It's challenging but still fun to play
for casual.
